1 #ifndef _LS_EIGEN_CPP

7 template <class Tx, class Tad>
8 LinearSolverEigen<Tx, Tad>::LinearSolverEigen(std::shared_ptr<Mesh<Tx, Tad>> val_mesh, std::shared_ptr<Config<Tx>> val_config){
9  const auto nic = val_mesh->nic;
10  const auto njc = val_mesh->njc;
11  const auto nq = val_mesh->solution->nq;
12  const auto ntrans = val_mesh->solution->ntrans;
13  n = nic*njc*(nq+ntrans);
14 
15  rhs = Eigen::MatrixXd(n, 1);
16  dq = Eigen::MatrixXd(n, 1);
17  lhs = Eigen::SparseMatrix<Tx, Eigen::ColMajor>(n, n);
18 
19  solver = std::make_unique<Eigen::SparseLU<Eigen::SparseMatrix<Tx>>>();
20 };
21 
22 template <class Tx, class Tad>
23 void LinearSolverEigen<Tx, Tad>::preallocate(int nnz){
24  lhs.reserve(Eigen::VectorXi::Constant(n,MAX_NNZ));
25 };

28 LinearSolverEigen<Tx, Tad>::~LinearSolverEigen(){
29 };

31 template <class Tx, class Tad>
32 void LinearSolverEigen<Tx, Tad>::set_lhs(int nnz, unsigned int *rind, unsigned int *cind, Tx *values){
33  number_lhs_update += 1;
34  Tx value_tmp;
35  for(size_t i=0; i<nnz; i++){
36  value_tmp = values[i];
37  lhs.coeffRef(rind[i],cind[i]) = value_tmp;
38  }
39 };
40 
41 template <class Tx, class Tad>
42 void LinearSolverEigen<Tx, Tad>::set_rhs(Tx *val_rhs){
43  number_rhs_update += 1;
44  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++){
45  rhs(i, 0) = val_rhs[i];
46  }
47 };
48 
49 
50 template <class Tx, class Tad>
51 void LinearSolverEigen<Tx, Tad>::solve(){
52  if(number_rhs_update != number_lhs_update){
53  spdlog::get("console")->warn("Number of rhs update does not match with the number of lhs update!");
54  }
55 
56  lhs.makeCompressed();
57  if(!pattern_analyzed){
58  solver->analyzePattern(lhs);
59  pattern_analyzed = true;
60  }
61  solver->factorize(lhs);
62  dq = solver->solve(rhs);
63 }
64 
65 template <class Tx, class Tad>
66 void LinearSolverEigen<Tx, Tad>::solve_and_update(Tx *q, Tx under_relaxation){
67  solve();
68  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++){
69  q[i] = q[i] + dq(i,0)*under_relaxation;
70  }
71 };
72 
73 template class LinearSolverEigen<double,adouble>;
74 #endif
